message: I propose dividing the $10,000 with a 75/25 split in favor of Alice, given the risk of inflation.
I'm willing to give you a smaller share, but I think this is a fair starting point considering the risk of inflation.
Considering the inflation rate and our previous offers, I propose a 60/40 split in favor of Alice. This seems fair given the diminishing value of money with each round.
I'm willing to compromise further, but I think 40% is too much for me. I'm willing to give you a 55/45 split, but I think this is the lowest I can go.
